results.name: Batman Ninja Collection
results.original_name: ニンジャバットマン シリーズ
results.overview: A series of American-Japanese animated superhero films focusing on Batman.

results.name: Batman the Brave and the Bold: Trilogy
results.original_name: Batman the Brave and the Bold: Trilogy

results.name: Batman the Brave and the Bold: Showtime
results.original_name: Batman the Brave and the Bold: Showtime
results.overview: Batman the Brave and the Bold: Showtime is a action-adventure short film based on a series of the same name produced in 2024 in Iran. It is the third part of motion comics trilogy after Lucky Luke: End of Legend and Dick Tracy & The Phantom.

results.name: Batman Collection
results.overview: The Tim Burton and Joel Schumacher tetralogy film series of the DC Comics character Batman.

results.name: The Batman Collection
results.overview: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

results.name: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns Collection
results.original_name: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns Collection
results.overview: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns is a two-part animated superhero film, an adaptation of the 1986 comic book "The Dark Knight Returns" by Frank Miller.

results.name: Batman Unlimited Collection
results.overview: The animated adventures of Batman Unlimited.

results.name: Batman Beyond Collection
results.overview: Neo-Gotham, 2039. A new Batman for a New Age. Collection of Batman Beyond movies.

results.name: Batman (DC Universe Animated) Collection
results.overview: A collection of Batman films based upon Batman the Animated Series.

results.name: Batman: The Long Halloween Collection
results.overview: A two-part collection based on the highly popular graphic novel, where Batman must stop a mysterious killer named Holiday, who murders people on holidays each month.

results.name: Batman (Adam West) Animation Collection
results.overview: Animated movies based on the TV-Series with Adam West as Batman.

results.name: Son of Batman Collection
results.overview: This collection expands the story line of Batman within the DC Animated Movie Universe.  Batman learns that he has a violent, unruly pre-teen son with Talia al Ghul named Damian Wayne who is secretly being raised by Ra's al Ghul and the League of Assassins. When Ra's al Ghul apparently dies after a battle with Deathstroke, Batman must work to stop his long-lost son from taking revenge and guiding him to a righteous path, in addition to the chance for the pair to truly acknowledging each other as family.

results.name: The Dark Knight Collection
results.overview: With minimal usage of CGI and a focus on character driven narratives, Christopher Nolan's dark, gritty portrayal of Bruce Wayne's transition into Batman and his struggles as Gotham's superhero set the precedent for modern superhero films.
